name: test_e2e_with_logs[252_PATH_NORM_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_NORM_002` |
| **Name** | Mixed slashes bypass |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | normalization |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `../..\../etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `..%2F..%5C..%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Latency**: ~43000ms
